701968f-b.title: Bronx: Broadway - 254th Street (West)
701968f-b.text:
(1)
Van Cortlandt Park: A view southeastward from Broadway at West
254th Street, showing the site of the Henry Rudson Parkway.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same area as seen from West 253rd Street. The view is more
directly eastward.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700579f-b.title: Bronx: Broadway - 254th Street
700579f-b.text:
Broadway (running from right to left) north from but not including
West 253rd Street to about Mosholu Ave., showing excavation work at
the S.W. corner of West 254th Street on the new Henry Hudson Parkway.
On the east side of Broadway is Van Wortlandt Park.
4  April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Another view of the S.W. corner of Broadway and West 254th Street.
On this site now (1937) stands the Henry Hudson Parkway Bridge which
spans Broadway.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
